scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w react-server" "npm run dev -w react-app"
scripts.build: npm run build -w react-app && npm run build -w react-server
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run cypress:run"
scripts.test:e2e:open: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run cypress:open"
